SEARCH
Package edu.cwru.csds293

Class AdjacencySetStatus

java.lang.Object
edu.cwru.csds293.AdjacencySetStatus
public final class AdjacencySetStatus extends Object
Class: AdjacencySetStatus Represents the validation status of an AdjacencySets structure. This class records all structural inconsistencies found in the adjacency representation of a graph (null incidence sets, missing endpoints, or asymmetric adjacency pairs). When no issues are found, the status is "ok."

  • Method Details

    • causes

      public Set<AdjacencySetStatus.Cause> causes()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all inconsistency causes recorded for this status.
      Returns:
      a set of failure causes; empty if no issues present

    • isOk

      public boolean isOk()
      Reports whether this status contains no errors.
      Returns:
      true if there are no inconsistency causes; false otherwise

    • nullIncidenceVertices

      public Set<Vertex> nullIncidenceVertices()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all vertices who had null incidence vertices.
      Returns:
      a set of vertices with null adjacency sets

    • missingEndpoints

      public Set<Vertex> missingEndpoints()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all vertices whose incident edges reference missing or undefined endpoint vertices.
      Returns:
      a set of vertices with missing endpoint(s)

    • asymmetricPairs

      public Set<AdjacencySets.VertexPair> asymmetricPairs()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all asymmetric adjacency pairs. An asymmetric pair is when a vertex lists an edge to another, but the latter does not list the corresponding reverse edge.
      Returns:
      a set of vertex pairs representing asymmetric relationships
